divs: Sighting DetailsI Was stargazing outside of my house, which is 12 miles out of town. And then it appeared randomly out of the corner of my eye. It looked like a star, or a plane but it wasn't moving. While i was watching it my heart started to hurt, and my chest felt as if i couldn't breathe i was staring at it for a really long time, after i felt fine. And i lost sight of the object after i glanced away to look at my cat, when i looked back..... It was gone. I Ran inside and stayed there for the night.
Object Shape: Circle, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Casper
There were no other sightings in Casper on or around September 10th 2011
